english.segment1: God loves the Jews. You know I have proof. Our Lord was one too. So please love the Jews. whoa.. love the Jews
english.segment2: John was a Jew. and Mark and Matthew. They all were but Luke. So please love the Jews. whoa.. love the Jews
english.segment3: Someone may want. some Bible proof. Romans 10:1, 11:2
english.segment4: James was a Jew. Peter and Andrew. And Bartholemew. So please love the Jews. whoa.. love the Jews
english.segment5: Paul was a Jew. Read Romans 9:2. The whole way straight through. verse 3 -- love the Jews. whoa.. love the Jews.
